mapper.insert: insert into coupon(ccode, cname, cprice, cstartdate, cenddate) values(#{ccode}, #{cname}, #{cprice}, #{cstartdate}, #{cenddate})
mapper.select: select * from coupon c, couponlist cl where c.ccode = cl.coupon_ccode and member_mid = #{member_mid} and cstate = 'available'
mapper.update: update coupon set cstate='used' where cname = #{cname}
